## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G45290](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G45290)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATMLO3, MLO3</u>
- **Gene Name:** MILDEW RESISTANCE LOCUS O 3, MILDEW RESISTANCE LOCUS O 3
- **Description:**   Seven transmembrane MLO family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
